mapper.select: select sa.* from sys_authority sa where sa.is_del = true and sa.authority_name = #{selectKey}

select sa.authority_permission from teacher t left join teacher_role_rel trr on trr.teacher_id = t.teacher_id left join role_authority_rel rar on rar.role_id = trr.role_id left join sys_authority sa on sa.authority_id = rar.authority_id where t.teacher_id = #{id} and t.is_del = 1
